messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: neo pets
messages.msgSnippet: When I first started I was hacked too! I had all rare items that originally started out on the site and are now unbuyable! You have to be really careful,
messages.messageBody:
When I first started I was hacked too! I had all rare items that originally
started out on the site and are now unbuyable!
You have to be really careful, sometimes if you send them an email and tell
them what happened they will reimburse you or find out what happened. Never
give you email addy out to anyone on the site, or your password. Supposed to
fun, but there is always someone who has to take the fun out of it :(
Indiana Tami

"You must be the change you wish to see in the world"
~Ghandi

Try out this fun site!
http://www.neopets.com/refer.phtml?username=angel1bunny
